select: Select the account to receive the code
select-1: Select the account to pay the membership package fee
fill-in: Enter name or VGA code to search
please: Please do not exit the screen and wait a moment
cancel: The transaction will be automatically canceled after:
check-account: Please check the vHandicap account received.
contact: If you have any questions, please contact customer service via the hotline
check-again: Please check the transfer details again.
hotline: Or contact customer service via hotline
or-payment: Or make payment according to the information below
note: You must enter the correct transfer details. Incorrect information may cause issues or delays in the transaction process.
invalid-type: Discount code does not apply to this transaction type!
error: An error occurred, please try again later.
buyed: The VGA code has been purchased
sorry: Sorry! This VGA code has already been purchased by another user. Please select a different VGA code and try again!
confirm-alert: Confirm the use of discount code
note-alert: Note, this discount code can only be used once. Are you sure you want to apply it to this transaction? (VGC will not reapply the discount code if this transaction is unsuccessful).
sorry-alert: Sorry! This VGA code has already been purchased by another user. Please select a different VGA code and try again!
hold-or-purchased: The VGA code does not exist or has been put on hold!
hold-alert: Sorry! This VGA code is currently on hold by another user. Please select a different VGA code and try again!
contact-us: Contact us for more promotional information and a better service experience.
